My Everyday Carries

Phone

I'll never leave home without my phone because I need it to contact others and for music obviously.

Wallet

I'll never leave home without my wallet because it has my important cards like my driver's license, student ID, and debit card.

Keys

I'll never leave home without my keys because 1. I need a way to lock and unlock my house and 2. I typically drive places (won't get far without my keys).
